attributes.action: Consider the stay as student if one is granted a work permit after completion of studies. This would help to show Government's commitment to treat everyone equally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, if someone came to UK as a student and then subsequently got a work permit they will only qualify to apply for Indefinte Leave to Remain in this country only after completion of 5 years on work permit. To me it is unfair as being a student the person has started to contribute to the economy from day one. All the fees they pay are higher than locals and these students are very useful work force for Small and Medium Enterprises too. Please have a re-think of immigration strategy.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
